item.title: Ali-Dashti on the Quran
item.description: Ali Dashti was born in 1896 in Dashtestan in Iran. At a young age, he was trained in Islamic theology, history, Arabic and Persian grammar, and classical literature in madrasas in Karbala and Najaf (both in Iraq).
